Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45339 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45339 affecting package sriov-network-device-plugin for versions less than 3.6.2-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sriov-network-device-plugin is earlier than 3.6.2-8, affected by CVE-2024-45339
